column5: + CHECK-IN: 3:00 PM - 10:00 PM. Please ask in advance if otherwise + Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Queen-size bed.  + Extremely convenient location: Next to Medical Center, NRG Stadium, Downtown or The Galleria. From 5-10 mins away.  + The place has 3 rooms all dedicated to Airbnb, so you can meet other Airbnb travelers!
